name: PollBuzzer
overview:
PollBuzzer™ is a new, real-time, consumer research tool, offering our clients immediate survey results and our panelists a simple way to get paid for their opinions.

Our clients can ask single question surveys of a proprietary consumer panel that is guaranteed to respond within minutes. In less than an hour, our clients can have an answer to their most pressing consumer questions.

Our panelists earn $1 for answering a single question. The questions come from businesses that want and value their opinions. There’s no cost to sign up, you can opt out at any time, and best of all, you have complete control over what you do with the earnings.
